expected_behavior: Agent dispatches to 'promote' mode based on the keyword in arguments
Agent identifies learnings that meet the promotion threshold: 3+ corrections across 2+ sessions
Agent applies the Routing Protocol to determine the correct target file for each promotion-ready learning
Agent routes to the narrowest applicable scope (rule before skill, skill before global)
Agent applies kaizen principles: incremental change, poka-yoke (prefer hooks/tooling over prose), standards work
Agent requests explicit user approval before modifying any instruction file
Agent runs 'wagents validate' after every instruction file modification
